content:
Today is Zulip's 10-year anniversary as an open-source project. Thank you folks for all your feedback along the way, and keep it coming. ;)

Please join us in celebrating this milestone if you're interested!

Community call with Tim Abbott

Tim Abbott will share stories from the last 10 years on a live call with the Zulip community. Please join us at 2025-09-30T09:30:00-07:00 !

Share your Zulip story

For this anniversary, we'd love to collect and share stories of what Zulip has meant to folks over the years. We welcome all stories, big or small. Is there a way you've used Zulip that's been meaningful? A nice interaction with the project? A fond memory?

A selection of the stories folks submit will be published in a blog post commemorating the milestone. Submit you story here by 2025-09-30T12:00:00-07:00.
